title: One of the current problems with league.
body:
When a champion relies on their opponents failing, they should be pretty good at not failing, and should have fairly robust but simple kits.

Like blitz or any vangaurd

When a champion relies on not failing to win, they should have essentially no safety net, but can be rather complex past that.

and here is the problem, champions that should rely on walking tightropes for the power to take enemy agency out of whether they win or lose are actually walking on 6 lane bridges with premier architecture. thus taking out all of the agency.
Champions like lee or camille are terrible to face always, not due to damage or utility, but because even if you catch them out its still a matter of them making several more mistakes to die.

One mistep should amount to a failure, especially against champions that are meant to take those mistakes and blow them out of proportion, and yet they often don't mean anything

replies.body: There is one problem with all online games and that is the spoiled, entitled and whiny AF player base. That is all.
